SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.cli

Class Table

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.cli.Table
public class Table extends Object
Table class represents the game table, which includes the scoreboard, public goals, normal deck, and golden deck. It provides methods to update the table state based on new turn events and to access the table's components.
